mapper.select: SELECT article_id, title, spot_id, summary, source_url, published_at FROM news_article WHERE spot_id = #{spotId} AND is_deleted = 'F' ORDER BY published_at DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news_article ( title, spot_id, summary, source_url, published_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{spotId}, #{summary}, #{sourceUrl}, #{publishedAt} )
